column1: The Petitioners are contract-based employees of the National Water Supply and
Drainage Board (1st Respondent) who are seeking this Court’s intervention to grant and
issue  a  Writ  of  Mandamus  to  compel  the  1st,  2nd,  5th,  6th,  9th,  10th,12th,13th  and  14th
Respondents to confirm their services in accordance with Public Administration Circulars
